text: Barry Shabaka Henley (born September 15, 1954) is an American actor and comedian. He portrayed Eddie Walker in Barbershop: The Series, taking over from Cedric the Entertainer. He often works in movies directed by Michael Mann. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:American movie actors category:American stage actors category:American television actors Category:Actors from New Orleans Category:Comedians from New Orleans Category:Living people
title: Barry Shabaka Henley
